mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, George Washington to Lawrence Lewis, 1799 January 23
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from George Washington to Lawrence Lewis, his nephew and soon-to-be husband of his step-granddaughter Eleanor 'Nelly' Parke Custis, addressing whether Washington wants to become the guardian of Nelly in order to authorize a license for their nuptials planned on February 22nd. Washington further discusses and offers advice to Lawrence regarding a military commission offered to him by the Secretary of War. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Custis family
